author: mybrandt
title: ODEURADA
description:
Integrating scents into crypto.
We all need to get that little renewed energy a day and what is better than having a scent created for you?
solution:
Creating a webspot so you can relax with a physical scent while you research crypto.
Combined with a NFT, your scent will be yours forever.
experience:
As a scent developer +20 years and a passionate crypto entusiast I would like to combine the two.
+2 years in Cardano and blockchain.
